products.title: Bella Blackout Flint Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Flint Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £9.60 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. Our Flint Grey is a staple colour suited to add sophistication to any room in your home.

products.title: Bella Blackout Mid Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Mid Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £9.60 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! Loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms.
This mid-grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Our roller blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart or the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.

products.title: Bella Blackout Pebble Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Pebble Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £9.85 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! This light Pebble Grey roller blind adds bold and vibrant  enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our roller are great for privacy and light control. At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This grey neutral roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Bella Grey Whisper (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Bella Grey Whisper (Blackout) Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
